title: Card
description: Explore how to create stylish and customizable cards.

meta.title: LNGRZUI | Card Documentation
meta.description: Explore how to create stylish and customizable cards.
meta.keywords: component library, reusable components, documentation, application development, UI toolkit

content.overview-desc: The Card component is a versatile container that can be used to display various types of content in a structured and visually appealing manner. This page explains the different features and customization options available for the Card component, allowing developers to create stylish and functional cards for their projects.
content.how-to-desc: To use the Card component, simply import it into your project and place the desired content within the Card tags. You can customize the appearance and layout of the Card using the available props such as color, size, and content alignment. Refer to the documentation for detailed usage instructions and examples.
